Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor, Talon, Straight Shot, Quickstride
Location: Deep Earth caverns

Tuscon's shot lit up the tunnel for a moment like a small burst of
lightning! Although firing wildly Tuscon still manages to hit one of
the approaching insectoid troops, causing it to stall for a moment.
However as it was one of Tuscon's comparatively smaller weapons it was
not enough to stop it completely, although the creature's armor is
burnt and dented from the impact!.

[Insect Trooper #2 is Hit By Tuscon] - Insect Trooper is now Moderately damaged]

"We are the Horde." the troopers say in unison, "Your energon will
only feed us and your technological distinctiveness will be added to
our own."

They continue forward, all of them several meters in front of Tuscon.
With uncanny precision, and in unison they raise their scorpion-like
tails and unleash their relentless firepower on Tuscon as the group
rides inside or on top, for the moment safe from their onslaught.

Fortunately most of the shots either miss, or bounce harmlessly off of
his armor. However the larger one's powerful energy strike actually
penetrated Tuscon's armor, biting slightly into his grill plating!

[Tuscon Hit By Insect Trooper #1] - Stopped by armor
[Tuscon Missed By Insect Trooper #2]
[Tuscon Hit By Insect Trooper #3] - Stopped By Armor
[Tuscon Hit By Insect Trooper #4] - Stopped By Armor
[Tuscon Missed By Insect Trooper #5]
[Tuscon Missed By Insect Trooper #6]

[Tuscon Hit By Elite Insect Trooper #1] - Tuscon is now Lightly Damaged

OOC: Is this clear enough for you guys? I'm experimenting with ways to
keep everyone straight on what's going on.
